settings.property_link: event.event_session_id = field.event_session_id AND event.event_id = field.object_id AND col.name = field.name
settings.prefix: create table #c (object_name sysname collate catalog_default, name sysname collate catalog_default, description nvarchar(3072)) insert into #c select object_name, name, description from sys.dm_xe_object_columns where column_type = 'customizable'
